name: Commander Vinny
description:
Made for Giantbomb's Giant Rom 4 Game Jam.

Theme: One Big Chomp

Controls (supports gamepad or keyboard):

Xbox Gamepad Controls:
Left stick: Move
X: Shoot
A: Dash
Start: Pause

Keyboard Controls:
Arrow keys: Move
X: Dash
C: Shoot
Esc: Pause

You play as Commander Vinny on his way to defeat the evil Dan who wants to force everyone to play endless Mario Party games. You must defeat his minions on the way to save the Giant Chomp. Good luck!

Programmed using: Gamemaker Studio Pro
Art: Aseprite
Sound effects: bfxr.net

All music by: Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
